title: Practical Chinese Language Education for Advanced Science Professionals Using Project-Based Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Science domain expertise and basic digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: A course focused on cultivating practical Chinese communication skills for science professionals to use in real-world scientific workplaces.

learning_goals: Learners can create project presentation materials using specialized terminology in scientific fields
Learners can deliver 15-minute oral presentations based on real-world scenarios from medical/legal/technical domains
Learners can collaboratively produce and share project deliverables using mobile devices

resources: Science Field Glossary of Specialized Terms

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
